mapper.insert: INSERT INTO GROUPDETAIL (GDID, GID, MID, GDBALANCE) VALUES (GROUPDETAIL_SEQ.NEXTVAL, (SELECT MAX(GID) FROM GROUPS), #{mid}, 0)

UPDATE GROUPDETAIL SET GDBALANCE = 0 WHERE MID=#{mid}
